sentences.en: Alliteration and assonance is not only a language phenomenon, but also an artistic one in poems.
sentences.cn: 摘要诗歌中的双声叠韵既是语言现象, 又是艺术现象.

sentences.en: In English poetry, aesthetic sense and English pronunciation are closely linked, reflecting especially in the metre, such as alliteration, assonance, rhyme, semi-assonance and onomatopoeia.
sentences.cn: 英语诗歌中的美感和英语语音息息相关，尤其体现在韵律的运用上，最常见的有头韵、尾韵、谐音、半谐音和拟音。

sentences.en: The sound form of poetry is often manifested in onomatopoeia, sound symbolism and some other musical devices such as alliteration, assonance, repetition, internal rhyme and so on.
sentences.cn: 声韵形式通常表现在拟声、语音联觉以及其他一些音乐手法诸如头韵、谐内韵、重复和行内韵等；

sentences.en: Theand easy language of assonance word easy to read, make people pleased, the meaning colorful.
sentences.cn: 叠韵词语言浅显明快、琅琅上口, 令人心情愉悦, 并使语意内涵丰富多彩.
